doc:
Douglass Watson https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Douglass_Watson 0 Larkin Douglass Watson III (February 24, 1921 — May 1, 1989) was an American actor. He was best known for his portrayal of Mac Cory on the daytime soap opera Another World. Larkin_Douglass_Watson_III ( February_24_,_1921 — May_1_,_1989 ) was an_American_actor . He was_best_known for his_portrayal of Mac_Cory on the_daytime_soap_opera Another_World .
